TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A rare cancer that forms in the part of the urethra closest to the inside of the body. The cancer often has spread deeply into the tissue.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "proximal urethral cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de uretra proximal"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cáncer poco frecuente que se forma en la parte de la uretra más cercana al interior del cuerpo. A menudo, el cáncer se disemina de manera profunda en el tejido.
